overview: Stefanie Berliant is the primary liaison for several of EyeTraffic Mediaâ€™s premier clients, including American University Kogod School of Business, Rack Room Shoes, and Museum of Modern Art. While working for a boutique web design shop, she honed her media and sales skills successfully closing deals and developing client relationships as the Marketing Manager. Stefanie values her partnerships with vendors and clients, working with them to produce and manage profitable strategic interactive marketing programs which include digital media buying and paid and natural search and campaigns. She graduated from the University of California, Davis with a B.S. in international relations.
